Function.DocText: BASE_MSG_FOR_CHOICE : use this var to set the display message ( in warning mode only ) BASE_MSG_FOR_MENU : use this var to set the menu message ${1} : use this var to set BASE_MSG_FOR_CHOICE ${2} : use this var to set BASE_MSG_FOR_MENU
MSG_TO_Display : use this var to set the displayed message when an user action is needed MSG_TO_Display : use this var to set the displayed message when an user action is needed
